20.title: Mike Tyson: King of the Ring
20.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. The baddest man on the planet, Mike Tyson connects with an electrifying uppercut, a karate hopeful gets put to sleep by an unwelcome fist to the face, and a fighter gets crushed by a killer straight right.

21.title: Big Time Hits
21.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Football star Troy Polamalu lays a devastating hit on an punt returner, a brutal right hook puts a boxing hopeful down for the count, and a chubby fighter takes care of business with a plus sized right hand.

22.title: Mike Tyson: Raw Power
22.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Mike Tyson delivers a brutal left uppercut, a devastating right hook knocks a brawler out of the game, and David destroys Goliath with a nasty punch to the big mans mug.

23.title: Mad Mike Tyson
23.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. The unstoppable force, Mike Tyson delivers a killer left hook, a devastating flying knee ends a fight in a hurry, and a wide receiver gets gonged on the gridiron.

24.title: Special Edition: One Hit Wonders
24.plot: A fighter gets creamed with a knee, a slam to the face sends a soccer player to a bad place, and it only takes one punch for a first time brawler to get KO'ed.

25.title: Special Edition: Outside the Ropes
25.plot: A karate hotshot get nailed by a knee, a camera man gets KO'ed on the football field, and a soccer player delivers a ridiculous flying kick to his opponents face.

26.title: Special Edition: Cage Rage
26.plot: An earth shattering right hand rocks a fighter's world, a devastating knee puts a cage warrior to sleep, and two gorgeous female fighters duke it out.

27.title: Big Bad Butterbean
27.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

28.title: Butterbean: Boxing's Favorite Big Boy
28.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Boxing's favorite big boy, Butter Bean sends another chump to the canvas, an unbelievable right hand blasts a boxer straight through the ropes, and a stone fisted fighter stops the brawl early with a vicious over hand punch.

29.title: Rich Franklin: Taking Care of Business
29.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Rich Franklin heads to Hawaii to deliver a KO punch in paradise, a warrior gets his clock cleaned by a nasty straight right, and a kickboxing cutie gets her face rearranged by the most dangerous woman on the planet, Lucia Rijker.

30.title: Punchers Chance
30.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. A vicious right hand KO sends a fighter into a ridiculous 360 spin, a brawler called "The Monster" connects with a knee blow down in Mexico, and a karate kick to the head puts a martial artist to bed.

31.title: Mike Tyson: Invincible
31.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. The baddest man on the planet, Mike Tyson destroys his opponent with a sensational left, see what happens when a mixed martial artist named "The Little Hulk" gets angry, and a fighter gets his cage rattled by a nasty kick to the head.

32.title: Mike Tyson: Best of the Best
32.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. The unstoppable force, Mike Tyson delivers a killer left hook, a basketball player's melon takes a hard knock from the hardwood, and a battle in Ohio leaves a Buckeye with a black eye.

33.title: Mike Tyson: Blunt Trauma
33.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Mike Tyson delivers a brutal left uppercut in his first pro fight ever, a fighter kicks things off with a powerful foot to the face, and a boxer uses his atomic bomb of a right hand to deliver a devastating first round knockout.

34.title: Mike Tyson: Incredible Force
34.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. The Brooklyn Bomber, Mike Tyson delivers a monster left hook, a fighter crumbles under a barrage of heavy fists, and an Olympic gold medalist ends a boxing match early with a righteous right hand.

35.title: Mike Tyson: The Most Feared Man Alive
35.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. A young Mike Tyson connects with a brutal overhand right, a south of the boarder brawler gets the "W" with a ferocious foot to the face, and a boxer gets his KO button blasted by a vicious left hand.

36.title: Roy Jones Jr.: The Confidence Man
36.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Roy Jones Jr. delivers a devastating left upper cut, a fighter gets lit up in Liverpool, and a well placed knee reminds us why Bas Rutten is one of the scariest men on the planet.

37.title: Mike Tyson: Fearless
37.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Mike Tyson delivers one of the hardest knockout punches of all time, a kick boxer called "The Big Chief" delivers a tomahawk kick to the cranium, and a fighter gets owned in Oklahoma by a nasty right hook.

38.title: Mighty Mike Tyson
38.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. The baddest man on the planet, Mike Tyson connects a vicious left hook, a brutal spinning backhand puts a kick boxer to sleep, and Bas Rutten heads to Japan to do what he does best, smash some guys face in.

39.title: Mike Tyson: Untouchable
39.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. The unstoppable force, Mike Tyson delivers a devastating right uppercut, a ferocious right sends a pretty boy fighter to the mat, and a female boxer that calls herself "Ms. Awesome," gets her cocky clock cleaned.

40.title: Mike Tyson: Dangerous
40.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. The Face Breaker, Mike Tyson delivers an unbelievable left hook knock out, a brawler gets crunched in the cranium by a nasty punch, and a cowboy goes beddy-bye after getting rocked at the rodeo.

41.title: The Captains of Crunch
41.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. An insane right hand sends a boxer outside the ropes, a fighting female gets her kicks from beating up chicks, and a kick boxer gets wrecked in the ring by a nasty left-right combo.

42.title: No Soup for You
42.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. A warrior gets put to bed by a monster left hand bomb, a nasty flying knee seals the deal for a full contact fighter in Japan, and a heavyweight kick boxing champion keeps his belt safe with a devastating KO punch to the temple.

43.title: Butterbean: More to Love
43.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Butterbean is on a roll when he KO's a foe in an exciting new venue, a karate specialist lets his foot do the talking, and the claws come out when the gloves go on when two female fighters get their brawl on.

44.title: Throwing Bombs
44.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. A boxer called, "The Magic Man" delivers an unbelievable left-handed knockout, a big time knee gets the job done fast in a Cleveland quickie, and a blond bombshell dishes out the pain at a female kick boxing match.

45.title: Mike Tyson: Total Destruction
45.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Mike Tyson delivers a devastating first round knockout, a monster kick to the face crushes a heavyweight, and an intense knee to the noggin sends a kick boxer to dream land.

46.title: Mike Tyson: On a Rampage
46.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Mike Tyson delivers a devastating right hook KO, an outmatched fighter gets smoked by a sizzling left uppercut, and a vicious kick to the head sends a brawler flying out of the ring.

47.title: Mike Tyson: One Man Army
47.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. The unstoppable force, Mike Tyson delivers a killer right hook, a monster kick to the head sends a lightweight fighter to bed, and it's a Salt Lake City smack down when a cage fighter brings a nasty left hook.

48.title: Mike Tyson: Man Child
48.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. An 18-year-old man child, Mike Tyson delivers a devastating left hook, a first time professional cage fighter gets creamed by a killer right hand, and an MMA fighter gets tagged in Tennessee by a monstrous head kick.

49.title: Mike Tyson: And the Beat Down Goes On
49.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. The baddest man on the planet, Mike Tyson's first Vegas fight ends in a vicious right hand KO, a three pack of nasty knees sends a kick boxer crashing to the canvas and a full contact brawler gets blasted by a ferocious foot to the face.

50.title: Mike Tyson: TNT
50.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

51.title: Mike Tyson: The Mayor of K.O. City
51.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. The Face Breaker, Mike Tyson knocks a British brawlers block off, a spicy left hook creams a contender dreams, and two feisty female kick boxers get all up in each others grills.

52.title: Blurry Vision
52.plot: The most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. A boxer gets bashed in a big time title fight, a dread-locked warrior gets crushed in the cage, and a sick kick boxer lets his hands do the talking.

53.title: Animal Instinct
53.plot: A boxer in fuzzy pants gets taught the bed time dance, it's goodnight when a full contact fighter gets cranked with an over hand right, and we head over to the lone star state to see a brawler two-step all over his opponents face.

54.title: The Knockout Express
54.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Heavyweight great Larry Holmes lays the smack down on Marvis Frazier, a fighter in a skirt dishes out the hurt, and a first class slugger gets slaughtered in San Diego.

55.title: Mean Butterbean
55.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. The Round Mound of Pound, Butterbean delivers a shocking KO punch to the ref, a nasty right hand destroys a hip heavyweight's plan, and a spinning back fist is a bald brawlers goodnight kiss.

56.title: Bad Intentions
56.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Former Olympic skater Tanya Harding proves she is now "The Big Mamma of Booya" with an electric over hand right, a boxer from Brooklyn gets leveled with heavy handed bombs, and a colossal kick to the cranium ends a middle weight contest before it even gets started.

57.title: Angry Mike Tyson
57.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Mike Tyson delivers a devastating right hand bomb, a fighter named Butcher carves up his opponent with a nasty over hand right, and a brawler delivers a world class mauling in Memphis.

58.title: Out Cold
58.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. "The Duke", Tommy Morrison gets his crush on in Kansas City, a boxer in Georgia gets his "Southern Bell" rung by a vicious right, and a big boy delivers a tasty Tucson tagging in a super heavyweight brawl.

59.title: Fearless George Foreman
59.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. George Forman grills a sucka with a tasty right hand knuckle sandwich, a super flyweight delivers a beating that would chop down a competitor twice his size, and a UK crusher creams his competition with a sick left hook.

60.title: Big Time Beat Downs
60.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. A boxer takes a bruise cruise that lands him outside of the ring, a big boy lets his fists fly fast and furious in a Sunshine State smack down, and a fighter named "The Monster" mashes all over his opponents face.

61.title: Good Night and Good Luck
61.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. A left hand bomb puts a Boston brawler to bed, a martial artists paints a painful picture all over his opponents face, and the fists are flyin' when a hulkin' Hawiaan lays the smack down in Honolulu.

62.title: All Aboard the Pain Train
62.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. A monster right hand caps off a Playboy Mansion pounding, a fighter named "the Razor" scores big with a sharp left hand, and a couple of brawling beauties prove that fighting like a girl can be kind of awesome.

63.title: The Floyd Mayweather M
63.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. A young Floyd Mayweather Jr. delivers a devastating barrage of punches on his way to the top, a brawler in Cleveland gets steamrolled by a nasty left, and a boxer gets his chops tenderized by a zesty flurry of fists.

64.title: Mike Tyson on Fire
64.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. The baddest man on the planet, Mike Tyson delivers a show stopping barrage of punches, a nasty knee puts a fighter down in D.C., and a boxing behemoth takes out a pudgy pugilist with a nasty left uppercut.

65.title: Slug Fest
65.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. A sick heavyweight slugger delivers a devastating first round smack down, it's one of the worlds fastest knockouts when an insanely quick kick to the head puts a Pancrase fighter to bed, and a brawler nicknamed Cyborg terminates the competition with a menacing right hand.

66.title: Mike Tyson: Man on a Mission
66.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. The Face Breaker, Mike Tyson gets it done with a nasty right hook to the temple, a kick boxer nicknamed TNT end the night with a dynamite kick to the head, and a Canadian warrior gets Canucked with a skull rattling left.

67.title: Butterbean Beatdown
67.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. The Round Mound Of Pound, Butterbean gets the pain train rolling with a delicious onslaught of lefts and rights, a middle weight fighter gets his eggs scrambled by a straight left to the temple, and it's a bald on bald beat down when two heavyweights mix it up in Sandy, Utah.

68.title: Buster Douglas: King of the Ring
68.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Buster Douglas takes care of business with a strong right hand to Dion Simpsons head, a heavy MMA fighter shakes and bakes his opponent with a hearty punch to the face, and a couple of ladies get all scratched up in an Alaskan cat fight for the ages.

69.title: Punch Drunk
69.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. A nasty over hand right gets the job done in a heavyweight boxing smacktacular, a cocky fighter gets his chimney swept in a UK slug fest, and two swinging sisters express their feelings with their fists.

70.title: Smokin' Joe Frazier
70.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Smokin' Joe Frazier brings the heat with a devastating left hook, a sensitive warrior delivers a powerful bouquet of punches in bunches while wearing a skirt, and a London bloke is going down when a strong right sends him straight to the canvas.

71.title: Flashy Floyd Mayweather Jr.
71.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Floyd Mayweather Jr. delivers a demoralizing flurry of fists in his first professional fight, a knee to the noggin sends a Brit to the land of nod, and a fighter named "The Hammer" hammers out some punishment on his opponents face.

72.title: Tommy Morrison -The Duke
72.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. The Duke, Tommy Morrison delivers a vicious one two combo that has his opponent seeing stars, a big man gets sent to bed by a fighter 100 pounds his junior, and an expert kick boxer lets his feet do the talking with a crazy KO kick to the cranium.

73.title: Knockout Express
73.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. A sensational cruiser weight called "The Ding-a-ling Man" turns his opponents lights out with a vicious left hook, a nasty knee ends a Pancrase fight before it even had a chance to start, and a couple of female brawlers beat each others brains out.

74.title: The Big Bang
74.plot: Knockout Sportsworld brings you the most spectacular knockouts from around the planet. Paul "The Punisher" Williams disciplines a welterweight, a too-tanned boxer crumbles to the canvas, and a cage fighter takes a not-so-nice knee to the noggin.

75.title: Seeing Stars
75.plot: James Toney turns the lights out on a ring rival, a kick boxer collides with a crushing left cross, and two ferocious females let the fists fly.

76.title: Amazing Finishes
76.plot: Shannon Briggs brutalizes a heavyweight hopeful, a muy thai mix-up ends with a regal right kick, and the Harlem Hammer hits the nail on the head.

77.title: The Nightmare Man
77.plot: The Nigerian Nightmare takes on a tattooed tough man, two Alaskan ladies lay the leather, and a Pancrase practitioner lets his knee fly north.

78.title: Raging Bulls
78.plot: James Toney jabs a journeyman into submission, a Karate kick ends with a cracked cranium, and featherweight fight comes to a fast finish.

79.title: Special Event: Butterbean, the Round Mound of Pound
79.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

80.title: Special Event: Butterbean, Larger Than Life
80.plot: A Knockout Sportsworld SPECIAL EVENT: BUTTER EAN - LARGER THAN LIFE. At over 400 pounds, Eric "Butterbean" Esch has coupled size with explosive knockout power to become a world-wide sensation. Today we take a look back at the amazing brawls that helped make Butterbean... Larger than Life!

81.title: Special Event: Mike Tyson, Kid Dynamite
81.plot: A Knockout Sportsworld SPECIAL EVENT: MIKE TYSON - KID DYNAMITE. Explosive power and don't-blink knockouts made Mike Tyson an overnight sensation. On this Knockout Sportsworld Special Event, we follow the teenager with fists of iron as he bursts out of Brooklyn and explodes into the ring as... Kid Dynamite.

82.title: Special Event: One and Done, Tyson's Fiercest First Round Knockouts
82.plot: A Knockout Sportsworld SPECIAL EVENT: ONE AND DONE - TYSON'S FIERCEST FIRST ROUND KNOCKOUTS. Mike Tyson was a K.O. king that destroyed his opponents with equal measures of lightning quick speed and unbelievable power. On this Knockout Sportsworld Special Event, we celebrate Mike Tyson's greatest first round knockouts.

83.title: Special Event: Mike Tyson, the Baddest Man on the Planet
83.plot: A Knockout Sportsworld SPECIAL EVENT: MIKE TYSON - THE BADDEST MAN ON THE PLANET. Mike Tyson destroyed all comers as he rose from the mean streets of New York to the become the greatest heavyweight champion of all time. On this Knockout Sportsworld Special Event, we honor the K.O. king... Mike Tyson, the Baddest Man on the Planet!

84.title: Special Event: Mike Tyson, Unleashed
84.plot: A Knockout Sportsworld SPECIAL EVENT: MIKE TYSON - UNLEASHED. Mike Tyson was the undefeated heavyweight king, until one man knocked him flat on his back and rocked the world of sports. On this Knockout Sportsworld Special Event, we take a look at the earth shattering knockouts that lead up to Tyson's first ever professional loss.

85.title: Special Edition: Kings of the Ring
85.plot: A Knockout Sportsworld SPECIAL EDITION: KINGS OF THE RING. The hardest hitter of all time, George Foreman delivers a brutal beating to Joe Frazier, Roy Jones Jr. teaches Vinny Pazienza a lesson in humility, and Larry Homes runs a boxing clinic all over Marvis Frazier's face.

86.title: Special Edition: Large and In Charge
86.plot: A Knockout Sportsworld SPECIAL EDITION: LARGE AND IN CHARGE. A big boy named "Hands of Steal" delivers a right hand that slays a giant, a pudgy pugilist makes a happy meal out of his opponents face, and a 303lb monster lights up his much bigger opponent with a nasty right hand.

87.title: Special Edition: World's Fastest Knockouts
87.plot: A Knockout Sportsworld SPECIAL EDITION: WORLD'S FASTEST KNOCKOUTS. A pancrase practitioner is sent to bed in the blink of an eye by a nasty right hand, it's a cage fight quickie when a heavyweight comes out swinging for the fences, and a ripped up brawler delivers a lightning quick KO punch in front of his hometown crowd.

88.title: Special Edition: For the Record Books
88.plot: A Knockout Sportsworld SPECIAL EDITION: FOR THE RECORD BOOKS. A one armed kick boxer knocks his opponent out cold, a ferocious fighter delivers an unlikely KO punch to a brawler 100 pounds his senior, and Frank Shamrock gets booted straight out of the ring and onto the floor in a pancrase KO you will not forget.
